conbody.p: The Scriptorium PDF (spdf4) plugin enhances the DITA Open Toolkit PDF2 plugin. The spdf4 plugin contains a variety of enhancements that are frequently needed in publishing.
These enhancements assume the following regarding the source documents:

ul.li: Source files use DITA version 1.2 or later.
The plugin has been tested with DITA OT 1.6.1. Earlier versions of the DITA OT may work, but have not been tested.
Books are constructed with bookmaps. DITA maps have not yet been qualified for use with this plugin.

Top-level book elements such as <notices>, <preface>, <chapter>, and <appendix> must have href attributes that point to valid topics (if the href attribute is not valid, the headings for these book parts will not appear correctly).
